DOC.brief_title: A Study Demonstrating The Effect Of Latanoprost In Combination With Timolol , Latanoprost Alone And Timolol Alone On Eye Pressure In Open Angle Glaucoma Or Ocular Hypertension In Patients
DOC.criteria: Unilateral bilateral primary open angle glaucoma , capsular glaucoma , pigmentary glaucoma ocular hypertension . Patients currently IOP reduce therapy : IOP great equal 25mmHg ( two IOP determination prestudy separate least one hour ) OR Patients without IOP reduce therapy : IOP great equal 30mmHg ( two IOP determination prestudy separate least one hour ) . History acute angle closure closed/barely open anterior chamber angle . Current use contact lens . Ocular surgery argon laser trabeculoplasty ( ALT ) within three month prior prestudy visit . Ocular inflammation/infection occur within three month prior prestudy visit . Hypersensitivity benzalkonium chloride component study drug solution . Other abnormal ocular condition symptom prevent patient enter study , accord investigator 's judgement . Cardiac failure , sinus bradycardia , second third degree atrioventricular block . ( The routine prescribe topical Bblocking agent follow . Bronchial asthma , history bronchial asthma chronic obstructive pulmonary disease . ( The routine prescribe topical Bblocking agent follow ) . Pregnancy Women childbearing potential used adequate contraceptive method last three month . Inability adhere treatment/visit plan . Have participate clinical study within one month prior prestudy visit .
